definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: Cucumber downy mildew is a rather serious plant disease damage in every place of world.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜霜霉病是对黄瓜生长发育危害最大的世界性病害。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Pseudomonas solanacarum (Smith) Smith.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯假单胞菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Soybean cyst nematode is one of the most serious diseases in the world soybean areas.
sentences.chinese: 大豆胞囊线虫病是世界大豆产区危害最重的病害之一。

sentences.english: Ervatamia divaricata leaf blight is one of the most important diseases in the garden of Jiangxi Agricultural University.
sentences.chinese: 狗牙花叶枯病是江西农业大学花圃重要病害之一。

sentences.english: Gummosis disease is one of the major diseases occurred on peach tree.
sentences.chinese: 桃树流胶病是桃树的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: Wheat yellow dwarf disease is a major disease in China.
sentences.chinese: 小麦黄矮病是中国小麦产区的重要病害之一。

sentences.english: The, soft rot of sweetpotato is one of the main diseases in store.
sentences.chinese: 甘薯软腐病是甘薯储藏期间常发生的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: The causes leading to the deteriorations are analyzed and measures for strengthening the plates and piers are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了V形墩病害产生的原因，并提出了加固措施。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Ralstonia solanacearum.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯劳尔氏菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Pathogenic identification of a new banana disease caused by Phytophthora sp.
sentences.chinese: 一种疫霉菌引起的香蕉新病害的病原初步鉴定。

sentences.english: Feudal and monarchical maladies no longer run in our blood.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的血液里已不再存在封建制和君主制的病害。

sentences.english: Aristichthys Nobilis diseased less, growing fast, tasty when cooked.
sentences.chinese: 鳙鱼病害少，生长快，肉质鲜美。

sentences.english: Root-rot is a destructive disease in the tung-oil tree (Aleurites fordii Hemsl. )
sentences.chinese: 油桐根腐病是油桐林的一种毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: Poplar crinkle disease is a new discovered in artificial poplar forest in Heilongjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 杨树皱叶病是在黑龙江省杨树人工林中新发现的病害。

sentences.english: Rut is one of main disease in asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 车辙是沥青路面的主要病害之一。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
